state.code:
classDiagram
    class FDU {
        - name: str
        - symbol: str
        - dimension: str
        + __str__(): str
    }
    
    class Measurement {
        - value: float
        - unit: FDU
        + convert_to(unit: FDU): Measurement
        + __str__(): str
    }
    
    class Metric {
        - name: str
        - value: Measurement
        - description: str
        + scale(): void
        + __str__(): str
    }
    
    class Parameter {
        - name: str
        - unit: FDU
        - value: float
        + to_dimensionless(base_unit: FDU): float
    }
    
    class RelevanceList {
        - parameters: List~Parameter~
        + add_parameter(param: Parameter): void
        + to_matrix(): DimensionalMatrix
    }
    
    class DimensionalMatrix {
        - core_matrix: List~List~int~~
        - residual_matrix: List~List~int~~
        + to_unity_matrix(): void
        + calculate_coefficients(): List~DimensionalCoefficient~
    }
    
    class DimensionalCoefficient {
        - name: str
        - value: float
        + evaluate_relationship(): void
    }
    
    class DASAProcessor {
        - relevance_list: RelevanceList
        - dimensional_matrix: DimensionalMatrix
        + perform_analysis(): void
        + generate_report(): str
    }

    FDU <|-- Measurement
    Measurement <-- Metric
    FDU <|-- Parameter
    Parameter <-- RelevanceList
    RelevanceList --> DimensionalMatrix
    DimensionalMatrix --> DimensionalCoefficient
    DASAProcessor o-- RelevanceList
    DASAProcessor o-- DimensionalMatrix
